docs.abstract: Sure, it’s a money-losing résumé site. To justify the $26.2 billion purchase, consider the tech value of relevance, data, talent and synergy.
docs.snippet: Sure, it’s a money-losing résumé site. To justify the $26.2 billion purchase, consider the tech value of relevance, data, talent and synergy.
docs.lead_paragraph: So what does Microsoft get for $26.2 billion?

docs.abstract: If a Fortune 500 company enters the pot business, especially in helping the authorities tax the stuff, can more legalization be far away?
docs.snippet: If a Fortune 500 company enters the pot business, especially in helping the authorities tax the stuff, can more legalization be far away?
docs.lead_paragraph: In case you think marijuana hasn’t gone mainstream: Microsoft is now weed- compliant.

docs.abstract: Microsoft’s online file-storage service is there to copy your files to the cloud, but you can decline the offer.
docs.snippet: Microsoft’s online file-storage service is there to copy your files to the cloud, but you can decline the offer.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. How do I make all my files stop automatically downloading to the OneDrive in Windows 10 Home Edition? Can I just get rid of OneDrive? I never use it.

docs.abstract: Apple and Dell, longtime rivals in the battle over sales to educators and students, now have plenty of company from companies like Amazon and others.
docs.snippet: Apple and Dell, longtime rivals in the battle over sales to educators and students, now have plenty of company from companies like Amazon and others.
docs.lead_paragraph: For years, Apple and Dell battled over sales to students and schools.

headline.main: Tech Makes Its Pitch to the Education Community

docs.abstract: Speaking in front of people can be terrifying. Several apps can help ease jittery nerves and possibly make you a more effective and eloquent speaker.
docs.snippet: Speaking in front of people can be terrifying. Several apps can help ease jittery nerves and possibly make you a more effective and eloquent speaker.
docs.lead_paragraph: FOR some people, public speaking comes naturally. But if you are like me, you may um and ah too much, spurred by the worry that nerves may get the best of you, that you might speak too fast or mess up in some way. So I have been practicing my public speaking with the help of some apps.

headline.main: Getting Over Stage Fright With the Help of Your Smartphone
headline.print_headline: Getting Over Stage Fright With the Help of Your Smartphone

docs.snippet: Supreme Court Rejects Puerto Rico Law in Debt Restructuring Case | Libyan Fund Claims Goldman Sachs Exploited Its Financial Naïveté
docs.lead_paragraph: THE UNSPOKEN REASON BEHIND THE LINKEDIN SALE | Microsoft’s $26.2 billion cash deal to buy LinkedIn was by far the largest in its history, and its biggest bet on a shift from traditional software toward cloud computing, Nick Wingfield reports in DealBook.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: The Unspoken Reason Behind the LinkedIn Sale

docs.abstract: As the marijuana industry grows inexorably more mainstream, an established company moves to enter the government compliance side of the business.
docs.snippet: As the marijuana industry grows inexorably more mainstream, an established company moves to enter the government compliance side of the business.
docs.lead_paragraph: As state after state has legalized marijuana in one way or another, big names in corporate America have stayed away entirely. Marijuana, after all, is still illegal, according to the federal government.

headline.main: The First Big Company to Say It’s Serving the Legal Marijuana Trade? Microsoft.
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Dips Toe Into Trade on Marijuana

docs.abstract: Microsoft’s extraordinarily generous takeover bid harks back to a time of higher technology valuations, but some analysts say there’s no going back.
docs.snippet: Microsoft’s extraordinarily generous takeover bid harks back to a time of higher technology valuations, but some analysts say there’s no going back.
docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft’s blockbuster $26.2 billion takeover of LinkedIn might be an attempt to travel through time. Specifically, to the heady heights of yesteryear’s technology valuations.

headline.main: For Microsoft, LinkedIn Deal Could Be a $26.2 Billion Time Machine

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Leslie Picker

docs.abstract: Microsoft’s latest version of Windows has its own style, but you can still use Jump Lists and find recently opened files quickly.
docs.snippet: Microsoft’s latest version of Windows has its own style, but you can still use Jump Lists and find recently opened files quickly.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I am still getting used to Windows 10. Can the Start Menu show a list of recently used stuff as Windows 7 does?

docs.abstract: The deal has a strategic logic, but its financial benefits are in short supply.
docs.snippet: The deal has a strategic logic, but its financial benefits are in short supply.
docs.lead_paragraph: Satya Nadella, the Microsoft chief executive, may have abandoned his prudent approach.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Deal for LinkedIn Raises Red Flags
